txt.en: 'The bears of the Old Forest have always been dangerous, but in the past they were not very aggressive and could be avoided. Now they are roaming all over the place and may even come out of the forest to threaten Buckland if they aren't stopped.\n\n'There is a tunnel through the High Hay, east of here.'
'Looks like you've been busy in those woods. Well a promise is a promise and you have earned this well.'
'The bears in the old forest are far more aggressive than anything that I have ever seen. I would like to see their number thinned lest they climb the wall and make meals of us hobbits.'
Brumbald Tunnelly needs your help reducing the threats from the Old Forest.
Defeated bears in the western Old Forest ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat bears in the western Old Forest ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The bears can be found in the Old Forest, east of his location near the High Hay. Look for the tunnel to the east.\n\nBrumbald Tunnelly has asked you to help lessen the threat of bears.
Brumbald Tunnelly can be found near the entrance to the Old Forest by the High Hay.\n\nHe has asked you to help end the threat of bears in the Old Forest.
